name: Maximum Service Frame Size
title: MSFS
definition: Identifies the Maximum Service Frame Size allowed (in bytes) for the EVC.

validEntry.description: EVC Maximum Frame Size Value (numeric value expressed in

validEntryNotes: The value of the EVC Maximum Service Frame Size must be less than or equal to the smallest of the UNI Maximum Service Frame Sizes.
fieldNotes: This attribute may be specified by the provider as part of their product offering.
More information regarding this field can be found in the Metro Ethernet Forum (MEF) Technical Specification MEF 10.3.
